actions.description: The horror makes two Limbs attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Limbs

actions.description: The horror expels necrotic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (7d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Hex Blast (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: When created, the horror's body composition takes one of four forms: Aberrant Armor, Loathsome Limbs, Malleable Mass, or Oozing Organs. This form determines certain traits in this stat block.
specialTraits.name: Formed by the Mists

specialTraits.description: The horror can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Amorphous (Malleable Mass Only)

specialTraits.description: Any creature that touches the horror or hits it with a melee attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.
specialTraits.name: Bile Body (Oozing Organs Only)

specialTraits.description: The horror can move through the space of another creature. The first time on a turn that the horror enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
specialTraits.name: Relentless Stride (Loathsome Limbs Only)
